random: SELECT * FROM jpwords ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 10
19: SELECT * FROM jpwords where lesson like '%m2-1-19%'
23: SELECT * FROM jpwords where lesson like '%m2-1-23%' ORDER BY RANDOM()
fuxi: SELECT * FROM jpwords WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM jpwords where lesson like '%m2-1-24%' limit 25 offset 0) ORDER BY RANDOM()
fuxiwrong: SELECT * FROM jpwords WHERE id IN(select id from jpwords where lesson like '%m2-1-23%' and wrong > 0 order by wrong desc limit 100) ORDER BY RANDOM()
xuexi: SELECT * FROM jpwords where lesson like '%m2-1-01%' limit 100 offset 0
new: SELECT * FROM jpwords where increase > decrease and lesson like '%m2-1-24%' order by increase desc
wrong: select chinese, wrong from jpwords where lesson like '%m2-1-24%' and wrong > 0 order by wrong desc limit 100
correct: select chinese, correct from jpwords where lesson like '%m2-1-23%' and correct > 0 order by correct desc limit 100
